title: From the Archives: Gabrielle Union on "We're Going to Need More Wine" - Extended Interview
itunes:title: From the Archives: Gabrielle Union on "We're Going to Need More Wine" - Extended Interview
description:
Gabrielle Union discusses her book "We're Going to Need More Wine," which reflects on her experiences as a black actress in Hollywood and a sexual assault survivor.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
